item.title: Lobsters Top Stories: Thursday, December 5, 2024 at 7:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. The "simple" 38 step journey to getting an RFC (18 points | 3 comments)
2. Keyset Cursors, Not Offsets, for Postgres Pagination (51 points | 17 comments)
3. Praise to scdoc to generate man pages (25 points | 15 comments)
4. Advent Of Code 2024 in Nix - Day 01-03 (9 points | no comments)
5. Breakage! in the Cargo.toml — How Rust Package Features Work (And Break) (9 points | no comments)
6. Alpine Linux 3.21 (12 points | 2 comments)
7. Flightle – Web-based 2D sidescrolling flight simulator (4 points | no comments)
8. Structured binding upgrades in C++26 (14 points | 2 comments)
9. NASA Graphics Design Manual (1976) (8 points | 3 comments)
10. Speeding up Ruby by rewriting C in Ruby (44 points | 22 comments)
11. Compressed Random-Access Trees for Spatially Coherent Data (2007) (5 points | no comments)
12. First impressions of the new Amazon Nova LLMs (via a new llm-bedrock plugin) (16 points | 8 comments)
13. Reversing Anti-Cheat's Detection-Generation Cycle With Configurable Hallucinations (3 points | no comments)
14. A simple live calculator with tree-sitter + cranelift jit (1 points | no comments)
15. You can’t get more adversarial than PvP MMORPGs (5 points | no comments)
16. “This is Just a Prototype”: How Ethics Are Ignored in Software Startup-Like Environments (3 points | no comments)
17. How to pack ternary numbers in 8-bit bytes (3 points | no comments)
18. Egoless Engineering (86 points | 15 comments)
19. What's up with Lobste.rs blocking the Brave browser? (21 points | 26 comments)
20. A complex bug with a ⸢simple⸣ fix (11 points | 14 comments)
21. The Cloud Container Iceberg (17 points | 4 comments)
22. A Brief Introduction to OCI Containers on FreeBSD (50 points | 19 comments)
23. Full-stack quantum computing, from hardware to compilers and algorithms (7 points | 4 comments)
24. The Hoare Cube (15 points | no comments)
25. Voice Activity Detection in Elixir and Membrane (2 points | no comments)
